text: @SpeakerPelosi @AC360 Well if everyone worked together 2 help America continue 2 improve (and not just re-Covid19) instead of trying to undermine each other (especially those trying to undermine The President) they would keep their jobs. If they don’t support The President then they shouldn’t be there
